items.sentence: You know very well the world doesn't revolve around you.
It was obvious that Tom and Mary didn't like each other.
It would be better if we didn't say anything about that.
Tom plays an instrument, but I'm not sure what he plays.
If you act like a child, you'll be treated like a child.
If I could've been at your party, I would've been there.
The last time that I saw Tom he was as drunk as a skunk.
I think that it would be a good idea for you to do that.
Tom gave Mary an envelope he wanted her to give to John.
Tom knew he wasn't going to get home in time for dinner.
